Plot: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.
Title: The Big Wedding
Writer: Justin Zackham (screenplay), Jean-Stéphane Bron (motion picture "Mon frère se marie"), Karine Sudan (motion picture "Mon frère se marie")
Actors: Robert De Niro, Katherine Heigl, Diane Keaton, Amanda Seyfried
tomatoConsensus: The Big Wedding's all-star cast is stranded in a contrived, strained plot that features broad stabs at humor but few laughs.
